Package io.spring.initializr.generator.buildsystem.maven

Maven build system.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MavenBuild
    Maven-specific build configuration.
    MavenBuildSettings
    Maven BuildSettings.
    MavenBuildSettings.Builder
    Builder for a Maven dependency.
    MavenBuildSystem
    Maven BuildSystem.
    MavenBuildWriter
    A MavenBuild writer for pom.xml.
    MavenDependency
    Maven-specific Dependency.
    MavenDependency.Builder
    Builder for a Maven dependency.
    MavenParent
    The <parent> in a Maven pom.
    MavenPlugin
    A plugin in a MavenBuild.
    MavenPlugin.Builder
    Builder for a MavenPlugin.
    MavenPlugin.Configuration
    A <configuration> on an MavenPlugin.Execution or MavenPlugin.
    MavenPlugin.ConfigurationBuilder
    Builder for a MavenPlugin.Configuration.
    MavenPlugin.Dependency
    A <dependency> of a MavenPlugin.
    MavenPlugin.Execution
    An <execution> of a MavenPlugin.
    MavenPlugin.ExecutionBuilder
    Builder for an MavenPlugin.Execution.
    MavenPlugin.Setting
    A setting in a MavenPlugin.Configuration.
    MavenPluginContainer
    A container for MavenPlugins.
    MavenResource
    A resource of a MavenBuild.
    MavenResource.Builder
    Builder for a resource.
    MavenResourceContainer
    A container for MavenResources.

Package io.spring.initializr.generator.buildsystem.maven Description

Maven build system. Provides a Build abstraction and a writer for pom.xml.
